name: Decay (Simon Chen)
description:
Xiuying must revive her mother by any means. One failed attempt has already caused her to become lost in a distorted maze filled with mutated monsters. Can she complete the ritual, or will she be stuck here forever?

Depending on which corpses you choose to perform the ritual on, different paths will open, leading to finding pieces of a ritual instruction page, which saves on each playthrough. The instruction page may reveal an important bit of information to Xiuying that may lead her to make a difficult choice in order to perform a successful ritual.

2D pixelated side-scroller with horror elements.

One week game jam by Simon Chen and Ruth Wang.
